Method Summary
 String focusWord()
          Returns the word at the center of the co-occurrence window.
 int getCount()
          Returns the number of times the relative word co-occurred with the focus word at the distance reflected in this instance.

          The distance between the relative word and the focus word.

Method Detail

focusWord

public String focusWord()
Returns the word at the center of the co-occurrence window. All other words in the window are counted at co-occurring with this word.

Specified by:
focusWord in interface WordCooccurrence

relativeWord

public String relativeWord()
Returns the word that occurs within the co-occurrence window a specific distance away from the focus word.

Specified by:
relativeWord in interface WordCooccurrence

getDistance

public int getDistance()
The distance between the relative word and the focus word. If this value is negative, the relative word occurred before the focus word

Specified by:
getDistance in interface WordCooccurrence

getCount

public int getCount()
Returns the number of times the relative word co-occurred with the focus word at the distance reflected in this instance.

Specified by:
getCount in interface WordCooccurrence
